body: I got banned and emailed but it's taking ages to be answered. Please help!
body_tagged: I got banned and emailed but it's taking ages to be answered. Please help!
title: HOW LONG!?!?!?

replies.body: Please be patient. By making threads like this you lower your chances of being appealed. However, I will do my best to make your appeal be noticed.
replies.body_tagged: Please be patient. By making threads like this you lower your chances of being appealed. However, I will do my best to make your appeal be noticed.
